snippet: The S.&P. 500 index has fallen 1.2 percent from its most recent high on Dec. 31, its worst start to a year in almost a decade.
abstract: Standard & Poor's 500-stock index has fallen 1.2 percent from its most recent high on Dec 31, its worst start to a year in almost a decade; weak start to 2014 is not good omen for stock investors.
lead_paragraph: The S.&P. 500 index has fallen 1.2 percent from its most recent high on Dec. 31, its worst start to a year in almost a decade.

headline.main: In a Slow Start to 2014, S.&P. Falls a 3rd Day
headline.print_headline: In a Slow Start to 2014, S.&P. Falls a 3rd Day
